metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5013 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
DOMPDF before 0.6.2 allows remote code execution, a related issue to CVE-2014-2383.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3').
